titles: George Whitehead's protestation against Francis Buss's persecution and abuse of the people call'd Quakers, his (quondum) beloved friends occasioned by his late scandalous paper, stiled, Some reasons &c.
author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Whitehead. cf. NUC pre-1956.
